course.subject: HUMA
course.name: Reading Modern Chinese History Historically
course.description: This course introduces students to a series of socio-political historical events in late-Qing and the Republican periods. More importantly, it introduces some of the essential skills in identifying the fundamental problems and narratives in modern Chinese history texts from the late Qing to the 1940s. Topics covered are traditional and modern Chinese historiographies, the Opium War, the Taiping Rebellion, Sun Yat-sen and the legend of the 1911 revolution, the impact of western imperialism on China, warlordism, the peasant revolutions of the 1920s and 1930s.

reviews.author: 科大黃金船
reviews.title: 唔睇readings，又無批判性思維走黎讀3字頭中史course送頭先係不知所謂😅
reviews.comment_content:
*教法同傳統歷史教學相反，個course大部分情況會以否定代替肯定，先破後立嘅方式黎教中國近代史。

中國近代史頭半part：晚清至1940
1. 歷史學，歷史嘅本質、何爲歷史科
2. 鴉片戰爭
3. 太平天國（因爲打風成part無左）
4. 帝國主義“侵略”下嘅近代中國：農業、工業及社會發展
5. 人物分析：“民族英雄”孫中山（Tutorial）
6. 軍閥
7. 中國近代農村及農民生活之迷思（Tutorial）
reviews.comment_teaching:
英文教，原因係因爲Virgil驚有大陸人聼唔明廣東話，而Virgil自己普通話好廢，先含淚用英文。結果係上堂通常係講講下英文就要插幾次廣東話翻譯，或者連Virgil自己都要捻一陣點用英文先可以表達佢嘅中史觀點，有時候上堂Virgil自己都唔記得個中文字點寫（所以你final寫錯字串錯字應該就唔怕）

3430同上個sem嘅2640一樣，精彩嘅地方係會就住右手邊個content，逐個逐個topic去駁Virgil佢比你睇嘅readings有咩係歷史學上唔準確同政治化左嘅弊病，所以d readings悶、白癡同唔符合現實係正常，就係比你去批判。

上堂完全唔會有ppt，亦無notes派比你， 甚至禁止你用電腦寫notes，大家係一齊回歸原始用紙同筆上堂，有人適應到，有人頂唔順，理解嘅。另外就Virgil教書每次都遲落堂再加教唔完，因爲教得太detail太pro，有好有壞。
reviews.comment_grading:
Tutorial 4成 : Attendance (9%) + leading discussion (7%) + participation in discussion (24%)

Final Exam：6成。
五條揀兩條。part A有兩條；part B有三條；你想用中文英文答都得，詳情見附件。
尼個sem f2f就返去手寫兩題，比你帶一張A4 size嘅貓紙，寫得幾多史料得幾多啦，寫完唔出嘅風險自己承擔。

Tutorial分數我無send email去問。你基本上有出現係Tutorial，有present過，有回應下其他人講果篇readings時候揾到d乜，我自己有次係睇完維基跟著係reading度捉蟲做point黎discuss都有分。

Final Exam：47/60，Virgil唔會出具體分數比你，唔好話乜你唔知，係咪讀到上U未寫過電郵？寫電郵問分好難咩宜家？

至於有人話好比心機抄notes同比心機上堂都爛，知道係盡左力，我覺得臨門一脚要有A range係show到自己有批判性思考同寫到少少自己揾返黎，上堂無教嘅料落去final度。

Final Grading：A
reviews.comment_workload:
入到U讀得尼d History course係咪預左要睇readings先😅 仲要係三字頭course😅
Lecture無attendance，但因爲你唔去lecture等於無notes抄，自己要衡量好。

一個禮拜你預平均要消化1-2篇readings，建議係早d睇曬尼個Topic要用嘅果3-4篇readings（大概2-3hr），因爲Virgil可以教3個禮拜都未教完尼4篇readings，自然事半功倍。

平心而論，三字頭嘅History course reading係要時間消化而且量多，係要食你一個禮拜三四個鐘頭走唔到（包括查字典）。

Tutorial有3次，（3次Tutorial其中一次要base on比你嘅readings去做present，答ta預先比嘅問題，其他兩次有舉手講野就夠。）唔知點解全世界都好鍾意整ppt去present自己係readings度d新發現，搞到好似個workload好大甘🤔，事實上其實你畫白板寫到你想講d乜mainpoint（同埋你係readings邊頁揾出黎）同比到readings入面d data出黎就夠。

至於話整合d notes，個final exam有5題 就係content果7個topic抽5個 你自己再揀兩個。
你肯賭理論上可以狙擊教得最多果兩個溫就夠，唔洗7個topic全部溫完又寫曬落貓紙度。

reviews.author: lokwu
reviews.title: A good reading Chinese history course
reviews.comment_content: The course discusses the definition of history, the historical accuracy of some Chinese history, and the difference between two types of Chinese historians. The professor will provide both Chinese and English versions of the books.
reviews.comment_teaching: The professor is very kind and he encourages students to join the class. He will point out the historical inaccuracy of some well-known Chinese history and his talk can help you to finish your own essay.
reviews.comment_grading:
This semester is online teaching so the grading scheme is different from the face-to-face.

Attendance to on-line classes: (20%)

Participation in-class discussion: (20%)
The professor picks two students to read the specific history book (mainly about 10-20 pages), both Chinese and English versions are provided and then the students share the book in the next lecture.

Two term-end essays (60%)
The essays consist of two-part and you choose one question from each part.
For part A, the questions are easy. If you attend most of the class then you will feel very easy to finish the part A essay.
For part B, you need to analyze the historical accuracy of some Chinese history. You may need to read some notes to help you. The essay needs more time than Part A's.
reviews.comment_workload:
The workload is very low.
You only need to attend the lecture, present your book about 1-2 times, and then write 2 essays. These are all you need to do to finish the course. Most of the time you just listening to the professor and reading the recommended history book (the professor only give a part of the books, mainly 10-20 pages each time).

reviews.author: Sharken
reviews.comment_content:
Topics:
What is history
Opium war
Taiping rebellion
Sun yat sin
Modern chinese economic development
Warlord
reviews.comment_teaching: The professor is interesting, not that boring for a history class. He will deliver lecture notes in every lectures, but I recommend to jot notes by yourself.
reviews.comment_grading:
One individual paper and one final exam, but he didn't release the marks so I don't know my performance actually.
The final exam consists of 6 question, but you just need to choose 3 of them to answer. Moreover, you can answer in English or chinese, depends on yourself, and I use chinese to answer the paper. I finally got a b+.
reviews.comment_workload: The workload is quite light, just one individual paper and final exam. No quizzes, mid term. However, if you aim at good grade, it's better for you to spend more time on the individual paper.

reviews.author: HOI LAU
reviews.comment_content: Very specific topic and detailed content. He provided some reading materials and conducted few discussions in class.
reviews.comment_teaching: Sometimes will change from English to Putonghua to explain some terms. Very clear explanation.
reviews.comment_grading:
Grading is not bad since it is a small class. You can use Chinese or English for your assignment and exam.
If you have pay attention in class and jot down somw statistic or opinion, the grading can be very good.
The essay is weighted 30%
Exam is weighted 60%
Discussion and class participation is weighted 10%
reviews.comment_workload: Not much workload except for the essay part. You need to do quite a lot research to support your stand
